vision.notes: Likely present, as they are free-living flatworms, but specific data is unavailable from the context.

chemoreception.notes: Inferred to be present due to their free-living marine lifestyle. Flatworms rely on chemical cues for foraging and navigation.

mechanoreception.notes: Inferred to be present, as free-living flatworms require tactile senses for interacting with their environment.
